Daily-UI

Graphic Design, UI
The Problem

Daily UI is a system in which participants are emailed a design prompt every weekday. Designers are given user interface design challenges and the freedom to interpret and design based off the prompt.

The Solution

I signed up to learn and practice user interface and graphic design outside of my industrial design classes. Below are (some) of my attempts to teach myself better UI design.
